zpyhelper.filesys module¶

zpyhelper.filesys.checkdir(dirs: list | str)[source]¶

check if directories exist, if not, generate directories

Parameters:

dirs (list or str) – a list of directory strings or a directory string

Raises:

Exception – input must be list or string

zpyhelper.filesys.is_jsonable(x) → bool[source]¶

check if an object is JSON serializable

Parameters:

x (any) – the object to check

Returns:

bool – True: serializable
